sentence_zh_TW: 每個班級的學生數量通常約為四十人，這使得教學變得更具挑戰性。
sentence: The number of students in each class typically averages ______ zero, making teaching more challenging.

sentence_zh_TW: 這把古老的鑰匙能開啟一扇通向未知世界的大門，激發人們的好奇心。
sentence: This ancient ______ can unlock a door to an unknown world, igniting people's curiosity.

sentence_zh_TW: 廚師們通常會使用鹽來增強食物的味道，讓菜餚更加美味可口。
sentence: Chefs often use ______ to enhance the flavor of food, making dishes more delicious.

sentence_zh_TW: 當有人問你是否有興趣參加活動時，你可以清晰地用簡單的回答“不”來表示拒絕。
sentence: When someone asks if you're interested in joining the event, you can clearly respond with a simple '______' to decline.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個標誌在夜間閃爍，吸引了駕駛者的注意，提醒他們注意安全。
sentence: This ______ flashes at night, catching the attention of drivers and reminding them to be cautious.

sentence_zh_TW: 在許多文化中，星期五被視為放鬆和聚會的日子，標誌著工作週的結束。
sentence: In many cultures, ______ is considered a day for relaxation and gatherings, marking the end of the workweek.

sentence_zh_TW: 當我們到達山頂時，能夠看到壯觀的景色，讓所有的努力都變得值得。
sentence: When we reached the summit, being able to ______ the breathtaking view made all the effort worthwhile.

sentence_zh_TW: 在截止日期之前完成所有任務是非常重要的，以確保高效的工作流程。
sentence: It is crucial to ______ all tasks before the deadline to ensure a smooth workflow.

sentence_zh_TW: 小雞需要定期餵養以促進它們的成長和健康，這對養殖業至關重要。
sentence: Chickens need to be regularly ______ to promote their growth and health, which is crucial for farming.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們可能需要更多時間來完成這個專案，因為它的範圍比我們預期的要大。
sentence: We ______ need more time to complete this project, as its scope is larger than we anticipated.

sentence_zh_TW: 這只優雅的貓全身覆蓋著黑色的毛，散發著神秘的魅力。
sentence: This elegant cat is covered in ______ fur, exuding an aura of mystery.

sentence_zh_TW: 作為這個團體的成員，他需要參加每週的會議以保持最新的消息。
sentence: As a ______ of this group, he is required to attend weekly meetings to stay updated.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這棟建筑物的正門有一個美麗的裝飾，吸引了路過的行人。
sentence: The main ______ of this building features beautiful decor that attracts passersby.

sentence_zh_TW: 在某些情況下，你需要叫出租車來快速到達目的地，避免遲到。
sentence: In certain situations, you may need to ______ a taxi to quickly reach your destination and avoid being late.

sentence_zh_TW: 音樂常被用作治療工具，能幫助人們釋放壓力和情緒。
sentence: ______ is often used as a therapeutic tool that helps individuals release stress and emotions.

sentence_zh_TW: 在冬天的寒風中，他試圖不讓冷風朝他的臉吹。
sentence: He tried to prevent the cold wind from ______ing against his face in the chilly winter breeze.

sentence_zh_TW: 在接下來的幾個小時裡，醫生將專注於修復她受損的心臟。
sentence: The doctor will focus on repairing her damaged ______ over the next few hours.

sentence_zh_TW: 孩子們在派對上玩玩具，並享受他們的無憂無慮的青春。
sentence: The children enjoyed their carefree youth while playing with the ______ at the party.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個藝術班上，學生們學習如何選擇合適的顏色來創造美麗的畫作。
sentence: In this art class, students learn how to choose the right ______ to create beautiful artwork.

sentence_zh_TW: 他的貓總是喜歡在陽光燦爛的窗台上打瞌睡，享受陽光的溫暖。
sentence: His ______ always loves to nap on the sunny windowsill, basking in the warmth of the sun.
